General.Name: Sakol Energy Public Company Limited
General.Description: Sakol Energy Public Company Limited operates in the energy industry in Thailand. The company provides natural gas compression services to the natural gas transportation vehicles of PTT Public Company Limited. It also generates and supplies electricity from biomass; waste and non-hazardous materials management services; develops securities trading software; and rents real estate property. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Pathum Thani, Thailand.

2.Name: Mr. Jakkraphong  Sumethchotimetha
2.Title: MD, Assistant CEO, Company Sec., Legal Dept. Mang. and HR Director & Director
